title: Bayesian Workflows course
text:
This is the webpage for “CS-E407520 Special Course in Machine Learning and Data Science: Bayesian Workflows” - a seminar on Bayesian workflows at Aalto University targeted at master students and doctoral researchers.

Prerequisites
Successful completion of CS-E5710 Bayesian Data Analysis or otherwise previous knowledge in Bayesian data analysis on a similar level is required.
The number of participants is limited to 30.


Assessment

5 ECTS
Pass/Fail

title: Schedule 2024
text:
The course is taught in period V (22 April – 3 June 2024) on Mondays from 14:15-16:00 in R030/A133 T5.
